extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed Connecticut is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!! _________________________________________ Need a license in Connecticut? Study anytime, any place with Drivers Ed Connecticut for any Android device.FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online drivers education, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 MVD questions. Your results are recorded so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests as many times as you want to make sure you know the material. Pick the length of each testâtake a test of 5 questions or as many as 100. Itâs your choice! Use the Flash Card feature to quickly study the important facts you need to know for the test.Of course, youâll still need to read the Connecticut Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed Connecticut, you can download the CT Driver's Manual to your device anytime! After the first download, the manual is saved on your device so you donât have to wait for the download again. The CT manual is an official DMV publication in PDF format. The text is crystal clear (pinch to zoom, just like a web page). This app works with DriversEd.comâs Connecticut drivers education course, which you can take to get your drivers license! DriversEd.com is approved by Road Safety Educators' Association & The Driving School Association of the Americas. Features: + Over 350 questions + Each Quiz pulls random questions, giving you a different quiz each time + Select the number of questions you want in each quiz + Results for each quiz are saved for your review and study. Tests can be retaken. + Download Connecticutâs Drivers Manual so you can read and study any time + Study with flash cards

reviews.comment: The app was very helpful. I\'ve studied every day by using this app and within a week later I went to The DMV, took the test, and passed with flying colors. I strongly recommend this app to anyone that\'s trying to get their permit or license in CT
reviews.author: sasha haynes
